questions.quote: No, no buts. We made up our minds.  We want Kramer. He showed us how much he cares about Steven.
Oh I'm lying. Why would I do it unless I was in mortal danger? I know it's against the law.
Because they're the best Jerry, the best. Look. Maybe I'm just being paranoid.
Well, I'll tell ya, this sidler guy is really chapping my hide.
hey, you know what? I just remembered something. I had a dream about that guy last night. This is amazing.
Anyway, you know why I didn't ask you, I mean I felt so uncomfortable, and you were so annoyed in the cab.
Uhm, look, I know this'll sound odd, but can I buy them from you?
Uh, maybe we'll just stand and watch the tv. [knock knock]. I gotta go someone's at my door. Yeah!
Jerry, are you blind? He's a writer. He said his name was Sal Bass. Bass, Jerry! Instead of salmon, he went with bass! He just substituted one fish for another!
C'mon up.  You know what? Do me a favor. Don't even do the move anymore. You're gonna give it a bad name.
